name: Deniz Mall
description: {'Location:': ['Deniz Mall is located in the Corniche of Baku, Azerbaijan, on the banks of the Caspian Sea, near the famous Bolivard.', 'Address: Neftchilar Avenue, Baku, Azerbaijan.'], 'Main Features:': ['Iconic architectural design inspired by flame shape.', 'Direct view of the Caspian Sea with great external sessions.', "Entertainment facilities, including IMAX Cinema, Children's Games City, VR experience.", 'Various restaurants and cafes offer international and local cuisine.', 'Wide parking and free Wi -Fi.'], 'Main stores:': ['Zara', 'Massimo Duti', 'Pull & Bear', 'Mango', 'Nike', 'Adidas', "Levi's", 'In addition to electronics stores, cosmetics and international perfumes.'], 'working hours:': ['Daily from 10:00 am until 10:00 pm.', 'Restaurants and cafes may continue to work until 12:00 midnight on weekends.']}
short_description: Deniz Mall is a modern shopping and entertainment center with a marine view, which includes international stores and high -end restaurants in Baku.

name: The king of the forest Sculpture
description: {'Information': ['"The King of the Forest" is an iconic sculpture created by Armenian sculptor Ara Sargsyan in 1966, located in the forests near Dilijan. This work of art portrays a tree transformed into a human-like figure with outstretched arms, symbolizing the protection of the forest and its inhabitants.'], 'Historical Importance': ["The sculpture holds cultural and artistic significance, representing the deep connection between nature and human creativity. It embodies the Armenian reverence for nature and the mystical relationship between humans and the forest, adding an element of folklore to the region's history."], 'Key Features': ['A tree sculpture blended into the surrounding forest, resembling a human figure.', 'Symbolizes protection and guardianship of the forest and its creatures.', 'An artwork that merges nature with human artistry, representing local beliefs.'], 'Working hours': ['Accessible year-round, there are no specific opening hours for the sculpture itself, as it is located outdoors in the forest.']}
short_description: A unique tree sculpture symbolizing forest protection, blending art and nature in Dilijan’s forested area.

name: Chayki restaurant
description: {'Information:': ['Chayiki Restaurant is located on the Baku Corniche near the Caspian Sea, and is one of the high -end restaurants that offer a distinctive eating experience in a quiet atmosphere and a great location directly on the sea.'], 'Restaurant features:': ['It features an elegant decor that mixes the modern and eastern character.', 'External sessions overlooking the sea, especially wonderful at sunset.', 'Woody staff and high -end and fast service.', 'An atmosphere suitable for families and special events.'], 'Main dishes:': ['Traditional Azerbaijani cuisine like Plov and Dolma.', 'International dishes, including grills, steak, and fresh seafood.', 'A wide variety of eastern and western sweets.', 'Cold and hot drinks, with a selection of traditional Azerbaijani tea.'], 'working hours:': ['It works daily from 10:00 am until 12:00 midnight.']}
short_description: A high -end restaurant with a marine view that serves Azerbaijani and international dishes in an elegant and comfortable atmosphere.

name: VereV Rope Park
description: {'Information': ['VereV Rope Park is an adventure park located in Dilijan, offering a variety of outdoor activities like rope courses, zip lines, and obstacle challenges. It is designed for all ages, providing an exciting experience in the beautiful natural surroundings.'], 'Historical Importance': ["While not historically significant, VereV Rope Park adds to the region’s appeal as a destination for outdoor and adventure tourism, highlighting Dilijan's emphasis on combining nature with recreational activities."], 'Key Features': ['High and low rope courses suitable for different skill levels.', 'Zip lines offering scenic views of the surrounding forest.', 'Activities for children and adults, including climbing walls and bridges.'], 'Working hours': ['VereV Rope Park is open from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM, with longer hours during peak tourist seasons (May to September).']}
short_description: An adventure park offering rope courses, zip lines, and outdoor activities, set in the scenic forests of Dilijan.

name: Dilijan Local Lore Museum and Art Gallery
description: {'Information': ['The Dilijan Local Lore Museum and Art Gallery showcases the cultural, historical, and artistic heritage of Dilijan and the surrounding region. It features exhibits on the area’s folklore, traditional crafts, and the works of local artists.'], 'Historical Importance': ['The museum preserves the rich cultural history of Dilijan and nearby communities, highlighting their traditional way of life, local artisans, and cultural practices. It serves as a key institution in the area’s cultural revival.'], 'Key Features': ['Exhibits on local traditions, folklore, and historical artifacts.', 'Displays of traditional crafts, including woodwork, pottery, and textiles.', 'Art gallery showcasing the works of local artists and photographers.'], 'Working hours': ['The museum and art gallery are typically open from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM, closed on Mondays.']}
short_description: A museum and gallery featuring Dilijan’s cultural and historical heritage, with local crafts and artworks.

name: Haghartsin Monastery
description: {'Information': ["Haghartsin Monastery is a 13th-century Armenian monastic complex located in the Dilijan National Park. Known for its stunning location amidst forested mountains, it is one of Armenia's most important historical and cultural landmarks."], 'Historical Importance': ['The monastery was founded by the Armenian King, Khosrov II, and has been a significant religious and cultural center throughout Armenian history. It includes several churches, a chapel, and khachkars (cross-stones).'], 'Key Features': ['Three main churches: the Church of the Holy Mother of God, St. Gregory, and St. Astvatsatsin.', 'Ancient khachkars, stone crosses, and inscriptions.', 'Beautiful mountain views and peaceful surroundings.'], 'Working hours': ['The monastery is open year-round. It is generally accessible from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM, but opening times may vary based on the season and religious events.']}
short_description: A serene 13th-century Armenian monastery set in the lush forests of Dilijan, known for its beautiful architecture and peaceful ambiance.

name: Baku eye
description: {'Information:': ['Baku Eye is a giant Ferris wheel located on the Corniche of Baku, next to the Caspian Sea and was opened in 2014, and is one of the modern tourist attractions that offer a unique experience to see the city from a high rise.'], 'Main Features:': ['Its height is about 60 meters, and it provides amazing panoramic views on the Caspian Sea and the Baku horizon.', 'It includes 30 air -conditioned cabins, making it a comfortable experience in all seasons of the year.', 'The cabins provide a 360 -degree panoramic vision from the top, especially sunset.', 'Its modern design, lighted in beautiful colors in the evening, makes it a great attraction for families and tourists.'], 'Tips for the visit': ['The best time to ride is before sunset, as you will get picturesque scenes of the city under the colors of the sky.', 'Avoid peak times on weekends for a quieter experience.', 'You can integrate your visit to Baku Eye with a picnic on a polypard or visit the nearby Mini Venice.', "Don't forget your camera! The views from the top are stunning."]}
short_description: Baku Eye provides a unique experience to see Baku and the Caspian Sea of ​​60 meters in comfortable and air -conditioned cabins.

name: Highland Park
description: {'Information:': ['The Garden of the Highlands, also known as Dagustu Park, is located on a high hill in Baku and is one of the most prominent tourist places that provide charming panoramic views of the Caspian Sea and modern and old Baku.'], 'Main Features:': ['It provides the best view of the Baku Corniche, the flame towers, and the entire city.', 'It contains wide arenas, fountains, and areas of sitting between trees and green spaces.', 'It includes the Memorial Memorial, a historical site that commemorates the martyrs of Azerbaijan.', 'An ideal place for walking or enjoying a quiet atmosphere away from the hustle and bustle of the city.'], 'Tips for the visit:': ['The garden button at sunset to take the most beautiful pictures of the city under the evening lights.', 'Wear comfortable shoes, there are many stairs and climb up to the highest points.', 'There are electrical stairs that facilitate the climb from the polyvard to the park.', 'Do not miss the nearby Flame Towers visit if you are in the area.']}
short_description: The highland garden provides the most beautiful view of Baku and the Caspian Sea, especially at sunset.

name: Dilijan National Park
description: {'Information': ["Dilijan National Park is one of Armenia's largest and most beautiful natural parks, known for its lush forests, diverse wildlife, and scenic trails. It is a popular destination for hiking, birdwatching, and nature exploration."], 'Historical Importance': ["The park has been a protected area since 1958 and is an integral part of Armenia's natural heritage. It is also home to several historical landmarks, including ancient monasteries and villages."], 'Key Features': ['Dense forests, hiking trails, and pristine lakes.', 'Rich biodiversity, including rare plant and animal species.', 'Historical sites like the Haghartsin and Goshavank Monasteries located within the park.'], 'Working hours': ["The park is open year-round for visitors, but it's best to visit from April to October for optimal weather. Trails and historical sites are accessible from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM."]}
short_description: A stunning national park with lush forests, scenic trails, and historical sites, ideal for nature lovers.

name: Fountains Square
description: {'Information:': ['Al -Nawafir Square is one of the most famous public squares in the center of Baku and was founded during the Soviet era, and today is a major meeting point for both the local population and tourists, where it is surrounded by stores, cafes, and restaurants.'], 'Main Features:': ['It includes many beautiful fountains with different designs, making them a special place for hiking.', 'It is a center for night and recreational life, with many international stores and brands.', 'It hosts outdoor musical events and performances, especially on weekends and tourist seasons.', 'Provides external sessions for cafes and restaurants to enjoy the atmosphere.'], 'Tips for the visit:': ['The square button in the evening to enjoy dazzling lighting and living atmosphere.', 'Suitable for shopping or eating in one of the high -end restaurants surrounding the square.', 'A great place to take pictures, especially beside the fountains and modern sculptures.', 'The square is close to the old city, making it a good starting point for walking rounds.']}
short_description: Nawafir Square, the beating heart of Baku, combines shopping, entertainment, and cafes with a vibrant atmosphere.

name: Mini Venice
description: {'Information:': ['"Mini Venice" is a tourist attraction located in the Bolivard Sea in Baku, Azerbaijan and was built in the sixties of the last century and was recently renewed to become a famous destination for families and tourists inspired by the Italian city of Venice.'], 'Main Features:': ['Industrial water channels can be mobilized by small boats.', 'Beautiful architectural design combines modern and Azerbaijani modern style.', 'Surrounded by restaurants and cafes that provide great looks on the channels.', 'A quiet and suitable atmosphere to take pictures and experience boat riding.'], 'Tips for the visit:': ['The best time to visit is the evening to enjoy the quiet atmosphere and beautiful lighting.', 'Rap the boat with a guide to enjoy children and families with an enjoyable experience.', 'Close to other landmarks such as the Carpet and Corniche Museum, so plan to visit you flexible.', 'Make sure to visit the restaurants near to try local cuisine.']}
short_description: Mini Venice in Baku offers a bouquet riding experience in water channels with a romantic and beautiful atmosphere.

name: Azerbaijan State Museum of Art
description: {'Information:': ['Azerbaijan National Museum of Arts is the largest museum of fine arts in Azerbaijan, located in Baku and founded in 1936, and includes more than 17,000 artworks of different ages and cultures, including Azerbaijani art, Russian, European, and East.'], 'Main Features:': ['It contains panels, sculptures and ceramic works dating back to different centuries.', 'The museum is divided into several halls, each for a time period or a specific geographical area.', 'It presents works by international artists along with the masterpieces of traditional and contemporary Azerbaijani art.', 'The museum building itself is an architectural masterpiece, located in a nineteenth -century historic palace.'], 'Tips for the visit:': ['It is preferable to visit the museum with a guide to take advantage of the detailed explanation of the artwork.', 'Set enough time to explore all halls, especially classical Azerbaijani art.', 'Do not forget to see the temporary offers and special exhibitions organized by the museum.', 'Photography is permitted in some sections, but check the rules when entering.']}
short_description: The largest arts museum in Azerbaijan displays local and international works at a historic palace in Baku.

name: Azerbaijan Carpet Museum
description: {'Information:': ['The Azerbaijan Carpet Museum in Baku is the first museum in the world dedicated entirely to carpet art. Founded in 1967, it displays a wide collection of traditional Azerbaijani carpets, making it a center for preserving this ancient cultural heritage.'], 'Key Features:': ["The building's design is inspired by the shape of a rolled carpet, a distinctive artistic symbol.", 'It houses over 10,000 pieces, including traditional carpets, national costumes, and handmade crafts.', 'It features interactive exhibits that explain carpet-making techniques.', 'It showcases different types of Azerbaijani carpets according to regions and traditional schools.'], 'Tips for the visit:': ['It is preferable to visit the museum with a tour guide to understand the historical details of each type of carpet.', 'Set enough time to roam and explore various exhibits.', 'The museum is located near the Corniche, so make your visit part of a picnic on the sea.', 'It is recommended to purchase entry tickets in advance to avoid waiting lines.']}
short_description: Azerbaijani carpet museum displays the history and culture of traditional carpets with a unique architectural design.

name: Heydar Aliyev Center
description: {'Information:': ['The Heydar Aliyev Center is a renowned architectural and cultural landmark in Baku, Azerbaijan, designed by Iraqi architect Zaha Hadid. It is characterized by its modern, fluid design and is considered a symbol of modernity in Azerbaijan.'], 'Key Features:': ['Unique architectural design with curved shapes and no sharp angles.', 'It includes a museum and halls for art and cultural exhibitions.', 'A vast space that hosts cultural events and international conferences.', 'Located amidst beautiful gardens and green spaces.'], 'Tips for visiting:': ['The best time to visit is during the day to see the details of the building from the outside.', "Don't miss visiting the internal exhibitions to learn about the history and culture of Azerbaijan.", 'Bring your camera, the place is perfect for taking unique photos!', 'Advance booking is recommended for events or private tours.']}
short_description: The Heydar Aliyev Center is a stunning architectural landmark in Baku, blending art, culture, and modern design.

name: Nizami Street
description: {'Information:': ["Nizami Street is one of the most famous streets in Baku, Azerbaijan. Also known as Shopping Street or Pedestrian Street, it stretches from the city's old center to modern areas and is one of the most important tourist and commercial destinations."], 'Key Features:': ['A pedestrian-only street, making it suitable for safe and comfortable strolling.', 'It houses many international and local shops, making it a distinctive shopping destination.', 'Cafes and restaurants serving local and international cuisine are spread along its sides.', 'It features an architectural blend that combines classic and modern European styles.', 'At night, the buildings are adorned with beautiful lights, which gives the street a magical atmosphere.'], 'Tips for the visit:': ['The best time to wander is after the afternoon or in the evening to enjoy the vibrant atmosphere.', 'Make sure to visit traditional cafes to taste Azerbaijani coffee.', 'Be ready to shop, where there are clothes stores, gifts, and jewelry.', 'Do not forget to take pictures in front of the illuminated historical buildings at night.']}
short_description: Nizami Street in Baku is a wonderful destination for shopping and strolling, featuring shops and cafes with a vibrant atmosphere.

name: The sidestreets of Dilijan and the revival of traditions
description: {'Information': ["The sidestreets of Dilijan showcase the town's rich cultural heritage, featuring traditional Armenian architecture, artisan workshops, and charming cafés. The area is part of an ongoing effort to revive Dilijan’s historical charm and traditions."], 'Historical Importance': ['Dilijan has long been a cultural hub, attracting artists, musicians, and craftsmen. Efforts to restore old buildings and revive traditional crafts help preserve the town’s unique identity.'], 'Key Features': ['Restored historic buildings reflecting traditional Armenian architecture.', 'Local craft shops selling handmade ceramics, textiles, and woodwork.', 'A blend of old-world charm with modern cafés, bakeries, and galleries.'], 'Working hours': ['The streets are open for exploration at any time, but shops and cafés usually operate from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM.']}
short_description: Charming historic streets in Dilijan with restored buildings, artisan shops, and cultural experiences.

name: Palace of the Shirvanshahs
description: {'Information:': ['The Palace of the Shirvanshahs is a historical royal complex located in the heart of the Old City of Baku, Azerbaijan. Built in the 15th century, it served as the seat of the Shirvanshahs rulers and is considered one of the finest examples of Islamic architecture in Azerbaijan and is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.'], 'Key Features:': ["The palace includes several buildings such as the Royal Hall, the King's Mausoleum, a mosque, and a bathhouse.", 'It features stunning architectural designs and intricate stone carvings.', "Provides a clear vision of the Shirvanshahs' golden age.", 'Located within the Old City, alongside other landmarks such as the Maiden Tower.'], 'Tips for the visit:': ['Wear comfortable shoes due to the uneven stone paths.', 'It is recommended to visit the place with a tour guide to better understand the history of the palace.', "Don't forget to visit the Royal Mausoleum and the Palace Mosque to enjoy the beauty of the inscriptions and decorations.", 'The ideal time to visit is in the morning or afternoon to avoid the crowds.']}
short_description: The Shirvanshahs Palace is a historical monument in Baku that reflects the splendor of Islamic architecture and ancient royalty.

name: Lake Parz
description: {'Information': ['Lake Parz is a small, picturesque lake located in Dilijan National Park, Armenia. Surrounded by dense forests, it is a popular spot for nature lovers and outdoor activities.'], 'Historical Importance': ['While the lake itself has no major historical significance, it has been an important part of the local ecosystem and a beloved destination for relaxation and recreation for centuries.'], 'Key Features': ['Crystal-clear water with lush forest surroundings.', 'Activities such as boating, zip-lining, and hiking trails.', 'A peaceful escape with picnic spots and a lakeside café.'], 'Working hours': ['Lake Parz is an open natural attraction and can be visited at any time. However, activities such as boat rentals, zip-lining, and the café typically operate from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM (hours may vary by season).']}
short_description: A serene mountain lake in Dilijan National Park, ideal for boating, hiking, and relaxing in nature.

name: Maiden Tower
description: {'Information:': ["The Maiden Tower is located in the heart of the Old City of Baku, Azerbaijan. It is considered one of the country's most prominent historical landmarks and is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Dating back to the 12th century, it is surrounded by many legends that give it a mysterious character."], 'Key Features:': ['A unique architectural design with a height of approximately 29 meters.', 'Offers a panoramic view of Baku and the Caspian Sea from above.', 'It houses an internal museum showcasing the history of the tower and the development of the city of Baku.', 'One of the most important symbols of Azerbaijani culture and is printed on the national currency.', 'Inscribed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.'], 'Tips for visiting:': ['The best time to visit is during the day to enjoy the views from the top.', 'Wear comfortable shoes, as there are narrow stairs to climb.', 'Set aside time to visit the old city surrounding the tower.', "Don't miss the opportunity to take pictures during sunset for a breathtaking view of the sea.", 'It is recommended to visit the museum inside the tower to understand the history of Baku more deeply.']}

name: Yaghli House
description: {'Information': ['Situated at Rijkov 6/5, Gyumri 3104, Yaghli House offers a diverse menu that includes both Armenian and European dishes, with a special emphasis on traditional desserts like "yaghli," a layered dough pastry topped with powdered sugar.'], 'Restaurant Features': ['Ambiance: The establishment provides a relaxed and inviting atmosphere, making it ideal for both intimate dinners and group gatherings.', 'Menu: Features a variety of dishes, including:', 'Spaghetti with Roquefort Parmesan: A creamy pasta dish with a rich blend of cheeses.', 'Mushroom Risotto: A flavorful rice dish infused with truffle oil and Parmesan.', 'Beef Sukhi: Tender beef cooked with cherry tomatoes and onions in a savory sauce.', 'Service: Known for its friendly and attentive staff, ensuring a memorable dining experience.'], 'Working Hours': ['Daily: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM.']}
short_description: Yaghli House combines traditional flavors with a welcoming environment, offering a true taste of Gyumri's rich culinary heritage.

description: {'Location:': ['The "Siren" hotel-restaurant is located in the city of Khorog, in the mountainous Badakhshan region of Tajikistan.', "It boasts a central location near the Bang River and the city's vital centers."], 'Facilities and Services': ['A restaurant serving local and international cuisine.', 'Comfortable rooms equipped with all amenities.', 'Free Wi-Fi', 'Private parking', '24-hour front desk', 'Outdoor garden and outdoor seating', 'Laundry service', 'Organizing local tourist trips on demand.'], 'Rooms:': ['Single and double rooms', 'Family Wings', 'All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a TV, a mini-bar, and a safe.', 'Private bathrooms with basic toiletries', 'Some rooms offer views of the river or surrounding mountains.'], 'Near tourist places:': ['Plant Khrauj Park - one of the highest plant gardens in the world', 'Pang Bridge - a famous teacher linking Tajikistan and Afghanistan', 'Central Central Market - for the purchase of local products', 'Badakhshan Museum for History and Culture', 'Bang River - perfect for walking and relaxing next to it']}

description: {'Location': ['Radisson Hotel & Spa Gyumri is a 5-star hotel located at 105 Shahumyan Street in the heart of Gyumri, Armenia.'], 'Services & Facilities & Rooms': ['The hotel features 64 stylish rooms, including Standard King Mansard, Superior King, Superior Twin, Junior Suite, and One-Bedroom Suite options, all equipped with modern amenities such as air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, and private bathrooms.', 'Guests can enjoy complimentary access to the Alexandra Spa & Oriental Bath, located just 120 meters from the hotel, offering facilities like thermal baths and rejuvenating treatments. The hotel also provides a conference hall and meeting room for business travelers, a lobby bar serving a variety of drinks, and a restaurant offering a daily breakfast buffet.'], 'Check-in & Check-out': ['Check-in: From 15:00.', 'Check-out: Until 12:00.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Cathedral of the Holy Mother of God ,Vardanants Square, Kumayri Historic District, Black Fortress.']}

name: Hye Aspet Hotel
description: {'Location': ['53 Shiraz Street, Gyumri, Armenia.'], 'Services & Facilities & Rooms': ['The guest house offers free Wi-Fi, a bar, a shared lounge, free private parking, and a free shuttle service.', 'The building, dating back to 1870, has been renovated to retain its historic charm while providing modern amenities.', 'It features two separate floors: "Knight" and "Byzantine Princess," each with bedrooms, bathrooms, and living room-kitchen areas. Rooms are furnished with vintage furniture and equipped with modern appliances, including refrigerators, microwaves, irons, and hairdryers.', 'The guest house can accommodate up to 7 guests at a time.'], 'Check-in & Check-out': ['Check-in: From 2:00 PM; Check-out: Until 12:00 PM.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Isahakyan House Museum.', 'Hovhannes Shiraz House-Museum', 'Peace Circle Park.', '"October" cinema built in 1924.']}
short_description: A historic guest house in Gyumri, offering a unique blend of traditional Armenian atmosphere and modern comforts, located near major cultural landmarks.

name: Ismaili Centre and Jamatkhana
description: {'Information:': ['The Ismaili Center and Jamaat Khana in Khorog is one of the main religious and cultural centers for the Ismaili community in Tajikistan and Central Asia. It was opened in 2008 with funding from the Aga Khan Development Network.'], 'Historical significance:': ['The center reflects the long-standing history of the Ismaili presence in the Badakhshan region, where Ismailis constitute the majority of the population.', 'It represents a symbol of religious and cultural identity for the Ismaili community after years of isolation during the Soviet era.', 'It promotes rapprochement between different religions and cultures in the region and is considered an example of religious tolerance and openness.'], 'Key Features:': ['An architectural design that combines modernity with traditional Badakhshan architectural elements.', 'Provides space for prayer, education, and social and cultural events.', 'It hosts educational and cultural activities aimed at promoting human and social development.', 'Surrounded by natural gardens and beautiful views of the Bang River.'], 'Working hours:': ['Days: Monday to Sunday', 'Hours: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM (Hours may vary during holidays and religious events)']}
short_description: Ismaili Religious and Cultural Center in Khorog, reflecting the community's identity and combining worship and education.
